name: Maidens Avatar Dressup Deluxe
description:
Maidens Avatar Dressup Deluxe

New and Improved for 2020! 10 years strong!!

First published on Dream-Maidens and Dark-Maidens in 2010

Let your imagination run wild with all types of themes and designs to help create your own fantasy avatar character. Dress-up with so many items from head to toe. We plan to continue adding more items periodically so you can enjoy a full experience.

Discover your creative side!

Over hundreds of fun items, backgrounds, hairstyles, clothes, etc.

1000s of Items to Choose FromCustomize from Many ThemesPeriodic New Item UpdatesEasy to Play!
